projects.name: Netflix Clone Project
projects.description: Created a Netflix clone using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring user authentication, dynamic content loading, and responsive design. Demonstrated expertise in front-end web development and modern web technologies.

projects.name: Todo List Mern Stack Application
projects.description: Developed a dynamic todo list web application using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and EJS templates, featuring real-time addition and removal of tasks based on user input.

projects.name: Ipod React Application
projects.description: Developed an iPod application replica using ReactJS, leveraging component-based architecture for modularity and scalability. Demonstrated proficiency in React concepts like state management, lifecycle methods, and reusable components.

projects.name: PhotoAlbum React Application
projects.description: Developed a photo album application using React, enabling users to organize and view their photos in a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.
